author: stevenwP2897PQ
title: Clean, nicely appointed Hampton Inn with recently updated rooms
text: A very nice Hampton Inn with clean rooms, comfortable beds, super friendly staff and a decent breakfast. The location was perfect for me as it was right near the airport, and between my two client's offices. South San Francisco provided some nice quaint restaurant options nearby as well.
